context:
Análisis de la notoriedad de marca
GLOSARIO
Notoriedad espontánea
Representa el grupo total de marcas de una determinada familia de producto mencionadas por la muestra entrevistada. Dentro de los límites
de la notoriedad espontánea, el consumidor decide razonablemente efectuar su compra.
Notoriedad guiada y notoriedad total
La notoriedad guiada representa el nivel de notoriedad de las marcas mencionadas por los entrevistados. La notoriedad total está compuesta
por la notoriedad espontánea y por la guiada. La notoriedad guiada muestra cuántos entrevistados identifican la marca una vez que se les
menciona, lo cual supone un importante índice del proceso de compra, pero, en caso de no estar en posesión de un elevado nivel de
notoriedad espontánea, la compañía necesitará realizar un esfuerzo mayor para alcanzar una mayor efectividad comercial.
Top of Mind
Es la primera marca mencionada por el entrevistado relacionada con una determinada familia de producto. Es el indicador más cercano a la
intención de compra o al uso actual de productos y está estrechamente relacionado con el valor de la marca.
Prominence Index
Es la relación entre el Top of Mind y la notoriedad espontánea; es un indicador sobre la calidad de la notoriedad y estima la capacidad de la
marca para representar una familia de producto entre aquellos que la conocen
Relevance Index
Es la relación entre la notoriedad espontánea y la guiada. Define la capacidad de la marca para ser mencionada cuando el cliente decide
realizar una compra.
35
question: What is the definition of Top of Mind?
answer: The Top of Mind is the first brand mentioned by the interviewee related to a certain product family. It is an indicator close to the intention of purchase or current use of products and is closely related to the value of the brand.

This chapter analyses the point of view of the dental laboratories about digital technologies, the use,

change: the dental practices, the laboratories themselves and the industry.

providing more often than others prostheses made with digital technologies: 37% of laboratories (vs.

of laboratories providing digital restorations is higher than the percentage of practices doing so. Again 
the percentage in UK is considerably lower than the overall result.

In general terms, the product / service factor has a significant weigh, the product's performance characteristics are, therefore, highly important to determine the overall satisfaction.

Sirona users make up about 90% of owners and, therefore, have a behavior very similar to the analyzed sample, with a slightly higher weight of after sales. 
The regression analysis is a multivariate statistical technique, whose main goal is to discover the existing relationship between one target variable (dependent variable, in this case, 
satisfaction) and a set of independent variables (each unique factor derived from factorial analysis). Thus, trying to understand and to foresee the behavior of the target variable 
according with changes in independent variables. One of the main focus of multiple regression is to evaluate how much part of the dependent variable (satisfaction) is explained by 
independent variables, in other words, how much these factors influence the behavior of a dependent variable. 
In order to complete the factorial analysis, it is important to also evaluate the weight of these factors on the overall satisfaction, in order to understand if the improvement in one of the 
factors may also improve the satisfaction of a given brand. The figure “R2=0.716” means that about 72% of the satisfaction is explained and based on these factors:

context:
Análisis de la notoriedad de marca
GLOSARIO
Notoriedad espontánea
Representa el grupo total de marcas de una determinada familia de producto mencionadas por la muestra entrevistada. Dentro de los límites
de la notoriedad espontánea, el consumidor decide razonablemente efectuar su compra.
Notoriedad guiada y notoriedad total
La notoriedad guiada representa el nivel de notoriedad de las marcas mencionadas por los entrevistados. La notoriedad total está compuesta
por la notoriedad espontánea y por la guiada. La notoriedad guiada muestra cuántos entrevistados identifican la marca una vez que se les
menciona, lo cual supone un importante índice del proceso de compra, pero, en caso de no estar en posesión de un elevado nivel de
notoriedad espontánea, la compañía necesitará realizar un esfuerzo mayor para alcanzar una mayor efectividad comercial.
Top of Mind
Es la primera marca mencionada por el entrevistado relacionada con una determinada familia de producto. Es el indicador más cercano a la
intención de compra o al uso actual de productos y está estrechamente relacionado con el valor de la marca.
Prominence Index
Es la relación entre el Top of Mind y la notoriedad espontánea; es un indicador sobre la calidad de la notoriedad y estima la capacidad de la
marca para representar una familia de producto entre aquellos que la conocen
Relevance Index
Es la relación entre la notoriedad espontánea y la guiada. Define la capacidad de la marca para ser mencionada cuando el cliente decide
realizar una compra.
35
question: What is the definition of Top of Mind?
answer: The Top of Mind is the first brand mentioned by the interviewee related to a certain product family. It is an indicator close to the intention of purchase or current use of products and is closely related to the value of the brand.

Key-Stone OmniVision Digital Europe 2015_Executive_Summary - 15 
Macro trends / Scenario 
LABORATORIES 
This chapter analyses the point of view of the dental laboratories about digital technologies, the use, 
the acceptance and the impacts. 
The dental laboratories were invited to state what they think about their future role in the production 
of the digital restorations, and about their relationship with the main players involved in this digital 
change: the dental practices, the laboratories themselves and the industry. 
 
USE OF DIGITAL TECHNOLOGIES IN DENTAL LABORATORIES 
Indirect restorations performed with digital technologies 
More than half of the sample (57%) stated to provide their clients with digital restorations. Germany 
and Spain are the countries showing the highest percentages. Again, German laboratories are the ones 
providing more often than others prostheses made with digital technologies: 37% of laboratories (vs. 
31% overall) provides this service on a regular basis. Like in all investigated countries, the percentage 
of laboratories providing digital restorations is higher than the percentage of practices doing so. Again 
the percentage in UK is considerably lower than the overall result. 
Chart 14. Use of digital technologies in dental laboratories - Europe vs. breakdown per country
context.question: What percentage of German dental laboratories provide digital restorations?
context.answer: 37% of German dental laboratories provide digital restorations.

Product / Service
In general terms, the product / service factor has a significant weigh, the product's performance characteristics are, therefore, highly important to determine the overall satisfaction. 
However, even after sale services play a central role, being in charge for 40% of the satisfaction perception.
Sirona users make up about 90% of owners and, therefore, have a behavior very similar to the analyzed sample, with a slightly higher weight of after sales. 
The regression analysis is a multivariate statistical technique, whose main goal is to discover the existing relationship between one target variable (dependent variable, in this case, 
satisfaction) and a set of independent variables (each unique factor derived from factorial analysis). Thus, trying to understand and to foresee the behavior of the target variable 
according with changes in independent variables. One of the main focus of multiple regression is to evaluate how much part of the dependent variable (satisfaction) is explained by 
independent variables, in other words, how much these factors influence the behavior of a dependent variable. 
In order to complete the factorial analysis, it is important to also evaluate the weight of these factors on the overall satisfaction, in order to understand if the improvement in one of the 
factors may also improve the satisfaction of a given brand. The figure “R2=0.716” means that about 72% of the satisfaction is explained and based on these factors:
OWNERS SAMPLE
context.question: What is the weight of the product/service factor in the overall satisfaction?
context.answer: The product/service factor has a significant weight, the product's performance characteristics are, therefore, highly important to determine the overall satisfaction.
